title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.16 - Qualifications to operate aircraft
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.16 - Qualifications to operate aircraft

State Regulations

No person shall land or takeoff in an aircraft at the
airport unless he is licensed by the Federal Aviation Administration to operate
that particular type and class of aircraft. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
